text: Giving UpThree weeks ago my boyfriend   of ten months very unexpectedly broke up with me  F  He first asked for a break  then after I had a night of panic attacks and fear of becoming suicidal again  he said he had to end it because he couldn t be a  sole support system  loving me was  complicated  and basically said I was damaged and top much for him  He didn t give me the chance to say how I felt because he left me crying and panicking   It s been the most difficult three weeks of my life  I can t feel anything but numb  I cry myself to sleep  I wake up panicking and can t sleep through the night  I ve tried everything  I ve reach out to old and new friends  I was the busiest I ve ever been  I go to class  I watch tv  I hooked up with someone  I m at a new therapist  I m on my meds  but nothing makes this numbness go away   I tried talking to him a few days after it happened and it was like talking to a brick wall  He s back on tinder and he s already seeing someone else and she looks like me  I had a complete breakdown again today and had to leave in the middle of my extracurricular because I spent   minutes panicking in the bathroom   Earlier I almost did it  but my friend convinced me to be strong and I told her I d try for a month  but four hours later I m having another panic attack and I m back in bed holding the same bottle of my migraine pain killers half wanting to just make the pain stop and the other half hoping if I end up in the hospital it will make him care again   I just want him back  He s the only one that can help with this pain and help me get through this  I have no energy left for pretending to be okay and being strong  I just don t want to wake up and deal with this bullshit all over again  It s not getting easier or better  it s getting worse and I just need this feeling to stop  If he can t come stop it I just need to do it myself
summary: Three weeks ago my boyfriend of ten months broke up with me. It's been the most difficult three weeks of my life. I can't feel anything but numb, I cry myself to sleep, I wake up panicking and can't sleep through the night, I have panic attacks, I'm on medication, I go to class, watch tv, meet with a new therapist, but nothing helps.
cleaned: week ago boyfriend month break difficult week life not feel numb cry sleep wake panic not sleep night panic attack medication class watch meet new therapist help

text: A comment on the United States Flag Code The US flag code defines that the flag has to have   stars  one for each state in the Union  It also defines that the stars must be positioned on a blue background  It does not  however  define how the stars are to be positioned  accordingly  if i were to position the stars in the shape of  say  a hammer and sickle  while probably offensive to a lot of people in the US  this would be a perfectly acceptable flag according to the US Flag Code
summary: The US flag code defines that the flag has to have stars one for each state in the Union and that the stars must be positioned on a blue background. The code does not define how the stars are to be positioned. If the stars were placed in the shape of a hammer and sickle, it would be an acceptable flag according to the US Flag Code.
cleaned: flag code define flag star state union star position blue background code not define star position star place shape hammer sickle acceptable flag accord flag code

text: Some notes from my diary latelyReflecting back on some of my prior notes  I feel like the hope is virtually gone now  Something s changed in me  I see the pointlessness of my life  the hopelessness of what I d dreamed  To be a father and loving partner And I feel a combination of apathy and bitterness  Distracting myself  I eat  I drink  I waste time  I smoke  A big part of me just wants to go on some epic fucking bender and end it all when I m outta money  Another part of me sees the smiles  the laughter and the good natured moods of people around me and wants them to feel my pain  my hopelessness  my bitterness  I feel acidic  corrosive  It takes most of my energy and strength just to be polite and kind right now  Most of the time  as horrible as it may sound  I just want to tell them to fuck off and stop living in a fantasy world  I want them to feel as hopeless as I do   People say be honest  They say  what s on your mind  They say you can say anything  Yeah  I highly doubt that Regardless  I can t be fucking bothered to lie about what I truly think anymore  Well  at least not here and with select few people anyway   Anyway  the hope appears to have been extinguished from my heart as bitterness and despair envelopes it poisonously  I am toxic to those around me now  I d say I hope for a positive way out  but to be honest I just want a quick  painless death now  Having attempted before  and knowing how much it sucks to try  I don t know if or when I ll have it in me to try again  Serious suicide attempts are no easy thing to try  I suppose it s fortunate for my family   friends  and the do gooders who want me to live  but I just don t care anymore  It didn t used to be like this  I d feel guilt  Now  Not much  They ll get over it in time
summary: Some notes from my diary reflect that the hope in my life is virtually gone. I am depressed and pessimistic. I don't know if or when I'll have the strength to try suicide again. I can't be honest with people anymore.
